aka: Curral De Moinas - The People's Bankers

cast.name: 保罗·杜阿尔特·里贝罗 Paulo Duarte Ribeiro

this_title: Curral de Moinas - Os Banqueiros do Povo
trans_title: Curral De Moinas - The People's Bankers
introduction: The adventures of Quim and Zé from the fictional Portuguese village Curral de Moinas continue with the cultural shock of these hillbillies coming to Lisbon. Curral de Moinas is already the banking-romantic-financial comedy of the year
